internal-ip

Get your internal IPv4 or IPv6 address

CLI

$ npm install --global internal-ip

``` $ internal-ip –help

Usage $ internal-ip

Options -4, –ipv4 Return the IPv4 address (default) -6, –ipv6 Return the IPv6 address

Example $ internal-ip 192.168.0.123 $ internal-ip -6 fe80::200:f8ff:fe21:67cf ```

API

$ npm install --save internal-ip

```js var internalIp = require(‘internal-ip’);

internalIp.v4(); //=> ‘192.168.0.123’

internalIp.v6(); //=> ‘fe80::200:f8ff:fe21:67cf’ ```

Related

See public-ip or ipify to get your external IP address.
